comments.text:
Created attachment 557294
Island Breath - Ea O Ka Aina.webloc

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
Build ID: 20110811165603

Steps to reproduce:

I use an outer frame around my google blogspot page. I try and edit a post.


Actual results:

The frame with by blog posting goes blank when I try and edit it. I have to open that frame in  new tab in order to edit it.


Expected results:

In the past (before 5.0) there was no problem and the blogspot post was editable within another frame.
comments.author: juanwilson@mac.com
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
Build ID: 20110811165603

Steps to reproduce:

I use an outer frame around my google blogspot page. I try and edit a post.


Actual results:

The frame with by blog posting goes blank when I try and edit it. I have to open that frame in  new tab in order to edit it.


Expected results:

In the past (before 5.0) there was no problem and the blogspot post was editable within another frame.
